Detailed Description

Class to read Igor binary files.

This class is extremely particular, creating a wrapper for Igor binary files containing DGF4c data. This enables DGF4c files read by Igor to be processed by OrcaRoot.

size_t  nBytesMax 
) [virtual]

Read attempts to place up to nBytesMax of bytes into buffer. This function must be implemented by derived classes. Returns the number of bytes actually read

bool ORIgorFileReader::ReadRecord ( UInt_t *&  buffer,
size_t &  nLongsMax 
) [virtual]

ReadRecord attempts to read the record pointed at by buffer. The function allows buffer to be reallocated hence requires "*&". Returns true if successful.
